name: Mixed Melee
description: A unit filled with a healthy balance of units

name: Swordsmen, Axemen
description: Men armed with longswords or axes, and shields. Strong in both offense and defense.

name: Great Swordsmen, Great Axemen
description: Men armed with great swords or great axes. Great attackers, but weak defenders.

name: Spearmen
description: Men armed with spears and shields

name: Polearms
description: Men armed with polearm weapons. Great against cavalry
